title: farm_water_pump_preparation_solar_direct_power
summary: Preparation of water pumping system for farm use during direct solar power availability.
description: This data unit records the preparation of a water pumping system at MaMeeFarm. The operation is conducted during the period of strong direct solar power availability from approximately 11:00 to 14:00, requiring water tank refilling. The activity is linked to inverter operation records where power availability is not continuous for 24 hours.

external_reference.note: External reference provided for verification only.
